title: Introduction to Digital Electronics
description: Semester CTE course that develops digital logic fluency through discovery labs, notebook evidence, and design communication.
instructionalModel: Investigative and discovery-first lessons before formal vocabulary instruction
Engineering notebooks used daily for claims, evidence, and reflections
Oral explanations and short defenses of physical circuit decisions
Frequent low-stakes checks followed by revision opportunities
